wallet_page.title: Wallet
wallet_page.card_description: Please export your private keys before uninstalling the app as all saved wallets will be deleted.

scanned_balance_info.title: Scanned Balance Info
scanned_balance_info.description: Scanned balance is the balance that the mobile wallet is able to use. After sending a transaction, scanned balance may display an amount that is not in sync with the available balance.

delete_confirmation.title: Confirm Deletion
delete_confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?

delete_outcome.success_description: The wallet you have selected has been deleted successfully!
delete_outcome.not_found_description: Something went wrong, the wallet you were trying to delete does not seem to exist. Please restart your application!
delete_outcome.incorrect_password_description: The password that you have keyed in is incorrect. Please try again!

import_outcome.invalid_description: We could not generate your address based on this private key.

warnings.not_saved: Your wallet has not been saved yet! Please save it!

save_wallet_outcome.in_use_description: The wallet name you have chosen is already being used.
